Description:
Security Manager / In-charge (Shopping Mall)Position Overview:The Security In-Charge for is responsible for overseeing and managing all security operations within the mall premises. This role involves ensuring the safety of visitors, tenants, and employees while maintaining a secure environment. The Security In-Charge collaborates with security personnel, tenants, and management to enforce safety protocols and respond effectively to security-related situations.Key Responsibilities:Security Operations Management:Plan, organize, and manage day-to-day security operations to maintain a safe and secure environment within the shopping mall.
Monitor security personnel activities, ensuring adherence to policies, procedures, and assigned duties.Team Supervision and Training:Lead and supervise the security team, including hiring, training, scheduling, and performance evaluation.
Provide ongoing training to security personnel on safety procedures, emergency response, and customer service.Access Control and Surveillance:Oversee access control systems, surveillance cameras, and alarm systems to prevent unauthorized access and monitor suspicious activities.
Coordinate with the security team to respond to security breaches and incidents promptly.
Managing CCTV Operations team and Control room.Emergency Response Planning:Develop and implement emergency response plans, including evacuation procedures, medical emergencies, and crisis management.
Conduct regular drills and simulations to ensure readiness for various emergency scenarios.Tenant and Visitor Relations:Interact professionally with tenants, visitors, and stakeholders to address security concerns, provide information, and maintain positive relationships.
Handle customer complaints or inquiries related to security matters.
Manage lost and found activities.Incident Management:Investigate security incidents, accidents, and breaches, documenting findings and implementing corrective actions.
Collaborate with law enforcement agencies when required.Safety and Compliance:Ensure compliance with local laws, regulations, and industry standards related to security and safety.
Implement and enforce security policies, procedures, and guidelines.
Collaboration and Communication:
Work closely with mall management, vendors, tenants, and external security partners to enhance overall security effectiveness.
Provide timely and accurate communication regarding security updates and incidents.
Reporting and Documentation:
Maintain detailed records of security activities, incident reports, and training documentation.
Generate regular reports for management, summarizing security operations and incidents.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent; relevant certifications in security management are a plus.
Proven experience in security management, preferably within a shopping mall or similar environment.
Strong knowledge of security protocols, emergency response, and safety regulations & CCTV Operations & Control room.
Leadership skills and experience in managing security personnel.
Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
Proficiency in security software, access control systems, and surveillance technology.
Analytical skills to assess security risks and implement preventive measures.
Ability to make quick decisions under pressure.
Customer-focused mindset and conflict resolution skills.
Attention to detail and organizational skills
